Posts.Content: Hi --I am new to this. I am just goinh into my 6th week of radiation and I have developed horrififc blisters under my arm. I have tried many creams eucerin aquaphor, aola gel/cream,aveno oatmeal creamany suggestions
Posts.Title: Skin burning

Posts.Content: Hi I have just been diagnosed with a re-occurance of DCIS in the left breast.  first diagnosed in 2010 treatment was  lumpectomy, 8 weeks radiation, and was on tamoxifen for three years.  I am a estrogen positive.  May 2013 I was diagnosed after a mamo with the recurrance.  July I had a right breast mastsecomy with immediate reconstruction starting with an expander and will have implants.  It has been 4 weeks since surgery.  I have now decided that I will do a mastsecomy on the right breast.  There are many knowledgable physiicans out there, the biggest thing is to be sure that you are comfortable with them.
Posts.Title: Ductual Carcinoma in Situ.
